title: Home Available For Rent In Birmingham
posting_body: IF THIS PROPERTY DOESN'T FIT YOUR NEEDS, FEEL FREE TO CALL OR EMAIL ME
I MAY HAVE OTHER PROPERTIES TO PASS BY YOU
Great condo alternative close to downtown.
New A/C 2017, new roof 2014, covered front porch, newer granite concrete driveway and back patio.

Anderson door walls, arched doorways & hardwood floors throughout, Updated granite kitchen with stainless steel LG appliances and cherry cabinets, open dining room and living room is adjacent to the kitchen, Living room built-ins, updated bath with heated floors & jetted tub.
Ceiling fans in both bedrooms recessed lights.
Fenced in backyard, surrounded by newer homes.
Birmingham Schools - Pembroke Elementary, Derby Middle & Seaholm High.

The agent does not guarantee the accuracy of the square footage, lot size, or other information concerning the conditions or features of the property provided by the seller or obtained from public records or other sources.
The buyer is advised to independently verify the accuracy of all information through personal inspection and with appropriate professionals.
